Text: Have you access to the UK translations of Stieg Larsson's 'Millenium (Dragon Tattoo) Trilogy' ?  A fried advised me that it's the better of the two translations.

No I don't. Seeing as I am American and that the UK and US versions are identical to be truthful. Just minor pronounciation and idiom translations. It's just like when they altered the first Harry Potter book to be Sorcerer's Stone instead of Philospher's Stone.
Thanks very much for the reply, anyway.  I very much appreciate your uploads.
RxJag, would you by chance happen to have any of Lilith Saintcrow's books? if you do, awesome and even if you don't, thanks for the uploads and thank you for taking the time to do it.
